Everything there is mid. The food at Little Ceaser is better than this one. The quality is poor in the ingredients overall. If you want to eat there, it's there in case you're hungry.
Fast and good

i love their pizza it's always fresh and very nice! i was here a lot of times and the workers are always nice and polite too. i appreciate it. no sitting place available though, you just have to consider that if you want to come

Ordered a half meat lovers// half Hawaiian pizza. The pizza was undercooked and doughy. I was totally underwhelmed with the experience. I will not repeat the experience.

Be aware of the price of the pepperoni pizza you order on Saturday's after 1:00pm. There's a six-piece lunch special W/Pepsi for $6.99 and then there's the $9.99 choice for the six-piece pepperoni pizza that comes with a six-piece cheesy bread. Don't let the little man with the big eyes fool you. He's going to act like he doesn't speak nor understand english. I tried to explain to him that he charged me for the $9.99 pizza when I wanted the $6.99 joint and since he took it upon himself to charge me anyway for the $9.99 pizza, I felt entitled to get the cheesy bread. My words to him went in one ear and out the other. My words held no substance as his english was lax. I got jerked üòë
They managed to make pizza worse than Dominos despite being a local chain.
AWESOME

Great pizza. Made fresh. Not a long wait. They also have chicken and many other items. They're open late .
This is my second time ordering and my pizza arrived very cooked. At first I thought it was sausages and pepperoni.  I don't know what happened to the quality but I hope they return to it.
We love there veggie and grandma pizza. üçï

Love their pizza, the meats lover is a must have. They are super polite & very clean. I order often from uber eats or personally go pick up my food, never no problems order is always correct. They get a 5 star from me & from my kids üòÅ.‚Ä¶

Came to this spot and Rimpy customer service was excellent. She kept a smile while taking our order. I would recommend friends and family coming here just because of her nice personality.

So, my loved one placed an order using Slice and not only did our order arrive late but our two pizza pies were not delivered. The driver showed up with just breadsticks, 2 orders of wings and a 2-liter of Pepsi despite showing me the‚Ä¶

Adding another comment because I think my review was deleted. I ordered on the website, they then called me to ask what pizza I wanted after ordering. When my order came we got Pepsi instead of coke, BBQ wings instead of buffalo, and a‚Ä¶

That elder man at the register though..he lied to me and said no money was on my debit card , so he could get cash but i let it go , and he charged me 8.20 for a 6.99 pie..He tricks his customers out of change . Smart ,Fast , but a swindler. Good pizza though. Lol im still going back sigh..üòÜ‚Ä¶

I walked in just out of a quick craving for pizza and tried their Meat Lovers with cheese on the crust, I hadn‚Äôt enjoyed pizza this much in a while. The staff was friendly and prepared my order rapidly, thank you for your service.

The quality of pizza here is very good . The meatlovers is my favorite.
The service is fast and friendly. I decided to wait after a couple visits before writing a review because this place is take out only.
Best Pizza around hands down!!! Excellent customer service!!!! My kids and I love this place! I would definitely recommend:)
